meanings.definition: Of or relating to the present or recent times.
meanings.sent1: The technology we use daily is very moderns.

meanings.sent3: The moderns gadgets make life so much easier.

meanings.sent5: The moderns design of the building stood out in the cityscape.

meanings.definition: A person living in modern times.
meanings.sent1: Moderns often rely on technology for communication.
